extendedInfo.description: 123Pet is an easy to use groomer appointment scheduling app for pet grooming business owners, employees, and independent contractors that letâs you manage your grooming business on the go. Whether youâre using the Windows Edition of 123Pet with Remote Access, or using our completely web-based 123Pet Cloud app, you can enjoy all the benefits of being mobile. COSTRemote Access and the Cloud Premium editions are free for the first month, and Cloud Lite is free forever. For detailed pricing information, please visit our website.EASY-TO-USE APPOINTMENT BOOKQuickly flip through days on your calendar, view and schedule appointments, and book time blocks to mark yourself off the appointment book.  123Pet is a great grooming scheduler app for any size pet business, and pet grooming business owners and managers can even check out the appointment schedule of any of the employees at the business. EASILY MANAGE CLIENT AND PET INFOView your clientsâ petsâ grooming or medical notes, see what products and services the client has purchased in the past, all their upcoming appointments, send them a quick text or e-mail right from the app, or even get a map to their address if youâre a mobile pet groomer. 123Pet is a useful pet grooming client manager and makes it easy to keep up-to-date and in contact with all of your pet salonâs clients.MANAGE TIME BLOCKSNot just a pet salon grooming scheduler, you can block out time on your calendar to let everybody at the business know when youâre not available. The appointment book is always in-sync, so everybody will instantly know your availability.CREDIT CARD PROCESSINGProcess credit cards right from your device. You can swipe cards using a convenient mobile credit card reader, or type in credit card information to process credit card or debit card transactions. Even e-mail a receipt when youâre done!PRODUCT SALES AND INVENTORY Manage your product inventory, and even sell products to clients right on your phone or tablet. Inventory is maintained automatically as products are sold, so you can always know how much retail product you have in the business at any time.OVER 25 REPORTSCheck your total sales, employee percentage booked, product inventory levels, and more right from your phone. Weâve included over 25 comprehensive business reports to make running your pet grooming business from anywhere a breeze. OTHER FEATURESâ¢ View your appointment book schedule, and even create or modify appointments on your calendarâ¢ Close tickets with any payment type, including credit cardsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove clientsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove pets â¢ Add, modify, and remove productsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove servicesâ¢ Add and manage employee tipsâ¢ Add and modify employeesâ¢ Manage employee online accountsâ¢ Customizable categories and settingsâ¢ Call, text, email, or map clients right from your phoneSUPPORT QUESTIONSIf you experience any problems please contact our customer support specialists via e-mail at support@daysmart.com or by phone at (800) 604-2040.PLEASE NOTE: As of May 1, 2013 this app requires a paid monthly subscription of $9/month per user if you wish to use this app to connect to your home or business PC. Our free cloud service that also works with this app and pricing for the paid cloud service have not changed. This pricing change was necessary to assure that we can continue to support our customers with the best possible products. After nearly three years of free service and two years of development time into our latest suite of products, it was clear that we could not continue with a completely free version of this app. Although our large user base is a complement to our products, it also generates a significant load on our services, which are costly to maintain. Keeping quality as the foremost goal, we decided to not introduce advertisements in our applications and instead introduce a straight-forward, simple, and reasonably priced subscription plan.

reviews.comment: Nexus 7 - Android 4.3 - Runs smooth, loads of options for business owners\tI recently downloaded the 123Pet app on my newest Nexus 7, and it runs perfectly. I was a little concerned at first as to whether 123Pet would run on the newest Android OS, but fear not because it runs flawlessly on this newest update! I think that anyone looking for a convenient way to keep track of their business and their client\'s pets is going to love the 123Pet app. Giving care to other people\'s animals requires precise methods and note taking for a quality job. This app helps me keep those meticulous details of these pets with the ability to easily access this information later on when needed. All the administrative tools that a business owner needs, right inside the palms of my hands, wherever I am! You can\'t lose out trying 123Pet out!
reviews.author: Michael Warunek

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Registered new details and claims I need to be in better reception (on wifi with no issue).  Then try again and already registered, yet try ti login and get another error!
reviews.author: Lisa Evans

reviews.title: Still buggy
reviews.comment: Works sometimes.   Can\'t   always sign in.   Great idea if you work out the kinks
reviews.author: jamie cohen

reviews.comment: You people are ridiculous!  $9 per person? For an app that was crappy when it was free?! ha! Get real.\tI wouldnt waste a penny on this crap. Best of luck to anyone willing to pay for this crap, your just helping to make someone rich who doesnt deserve it. Instead, put your money where it will really matter, to help starving children of the world, or homeless pets. Not this crap.
reviews.author: Kris Smith

reviews.comment: Works GREAT
reviews.author: James Poole

reviews.title: Kind of useless.
reviews.comment: It\'s not the product for me. It\'s not very user friendly and navigating it is very frustrating. Also, there is no way to add in clients with existing history, you can only add new information unless you download the desktop version, which makes transferring an existing database a nightmare. A++ for customer service, though. They make me wish this was a product for me.
reviews.author: Angela Richie

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: I wish you could use this even when the compute in off. Also needs to have a doggie daycare on there also.
reviews.author: Teresa Cashion

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: I like 123petsoftware, they could improve the app more. Wish I could see more than just one day at a time. it seems to not connect every time I try to log in. honestly I rarely use the app because I cant rely on it to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: The app is not as easy to use as I hoped it would be. You can only view one day at a time, and the appointments don\'t always stay when u book them. Also I can\'t even access the app half the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pleased with app
reviews.comment: I am happy with the app was able to book appointments after just meeting new clients on the road.  And great for checking shedule in case of canceling bookings clients can be notified without me going back to shop to do this.  Overall very happy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be a good app
reviews.comment: It was a good app but now has become a PITA. It will only log in intermittently and so checking my schedule has become frustrating at best. Not sure what has been done but it also is not stable on the pc either. Prints tickets when it feels like it. Get it together.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: The only thing I wish they would change is being able to view all employees\' calendars in one view. Where I work we have 3 different employee calendars, and when using this ap I have to switch between the pages to make sure that when I schedule appts. I do not double book any dogs. (Have a \"week at a glance\" view, and have all appts. show up regardless of which employee it is under) pleeeeeeaaaaassssssseeeee!
reviews.author: Samantha Gorton

reviews.title: Its ok but needs help.
reviews.comment: I changed my cell phone from a Blackberry to a Android just for the phone app. From a business owner I find the application is lacking. I pay for the online booking feature and I feel that online booking feature and phone applications should communicate together so appointments don\'t get so FUBARed (military lingo for \"f\'ed up be all reconition\"). Also I needed to do a couple of  time blocks but couldn\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Five stars
reviews.comment: I love this program
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: much easier
reviews.comment: I don\'t have to call work to find out when I\'m scheduled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for 24 hour service
reviews.comment: So far this app has been great. It does not have all the features you might want, but great for those clients who like to book after hours or via text, which lots of ours do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Have just to check not good for much else
reviews.comment: I really wish you could see and do everything like the system on the computer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited usability
reviews.comment: Not able to see ticket prices, offer coupons, etc.  It is not user friendly and not intuitive.   With more work it could be a good ap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just wish it would show the type of dog.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Owner
reviews.comment: Its the best thin ever
reviews.author: A Google User
